name: html5-qrcode-ru
description: Кроссплатформенный сканер QR-кодов и штрих-кодов HTML5

scripts.build-windows: npm run build:es2015 && npm run build:esm && npm run build:esnext && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:umd_windows && npm run build:typing && npm run build:copy_windows
scripts.test: npm run-script test:build && npm run-script test:run
scripts.test_windows: npm run-script test:build && npm run-script test:run_windows
scripts.build: npm run build:es2015 && npm run build:esm && npm run build:esnext && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:typing && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:copy: cp README.md dist && cp package.json dist && cp LICENSE dist && cp -R src dist/src
scripts.build:copy_windows: copy README.md dist && copy package.json dist && copy LICENSE dist && xcopy .\src .\dist\src /S /I /Y
scripts.internal_release: npm run build && cp dist/html5-qrcode.min.js minified/html5-qrcode.min.js
scripts.release: npm run build && cp dist/html5-qrcode.min.js minified/html5-qrcode.min.js && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.release_windows: npm run build && cp dist\html5-qrcode.min.js minified\html5-qrcode.min.js && cd dist && npm publish

author: wolfcreative
